banner1Content: The School of Criminology of the University of Kinshasa was created by Order of the Minister of Higher and University Education of October 30, 2018, modified and supplemented by the Order of February 24, 2021. It absorbs the current Center of Criminology and social pathology (CCPS), formerly attached to the faculty of law.
